VariableDescription.Name: P_DENS

VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     DATA_TYPE                       PM>PESA (On-Board) Ion Moments @ Spin Resolution (version 3), Wind 3DP
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Interplanetary Studies

#                                      LOW, Wind 3DP                                                                                         
#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     TEXT                            Wind 3dp, PESA LOW 1 spin resolution ion (proton and alpha) moments (computed                          
#                                      on spacecraft)                                                                                        
#     PI_NAME                         R. Lin
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  UC Berkeley
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Plasma and Solar Wind
#                                     Particles (space)
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Wind
#                                     !___Interplanetary Data near 1 AU
#     DATA_VERSION                    1
#     DESCRIPTOR                      3DP>3-D PLASMA ANALYZER
#     GENERATION_DATE                 
#     ACKNOWLEDGEMENT                 
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0143
#     LINK_TEXT                       Wind 3DP
#     RULES_OF_USE                    
#     GENERATED_BY                    
#     MODS                            Version 3 Product, August 2005
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 
#     LINK_TITLE                      home page at UCB (with plotting and digital data)

#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  wi_pm_3dp
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 wi_pm_3dp_00000000_v01
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              Wind_3DP_Ion-Moments-Onboard-PM_3sec_cdf
#     SPASE_DATASETRESOURCEID         spase://VHO/NumericalData/Wind/3DP/PT03S

#              ************************************

#       NOTES:  Time is centered, confirmed for 3DP by P.Schroeder 2005 Nov 07
#  2. [Values are fill 5/20/2009-5/11/2010; noisy 3/8/2012 04:37 to 5/15/2012 22:45] Proton number density
#       NOTES:  Proton number density values are fill for time period 5/20/2009-5/11/2010; noisy 3/8/2012 04:37 to 5/15/2012 22:45]

# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.

VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#       NOTES:  Proton number density values are fill for time period 5/20/2009-5/11/2010; noisy 3/8/2012 04:37 to 5/15/2012 22:45]
#

dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms           #/cm3
15-11-1994 12:53:43.870            NaN
